import React from 'react' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import $ from 'jquery' import Addsong from './Addsong' const AdminPanel = () => { const [isvis, setisvis] = useState(false); const [mode, setmode] = useState("light"); useEffect(() => { const md = sessionStorage.getItem('theme') document.body.className = md }, [mode]) return ( <>
{ if(isvis) { $('.leftnav').css("display","none") setisvis(false); } else{ $('.leftnav').css("display","block") setisvis(true); } }}>


{islog ? {uname} : LOGIN }
